PostReward

nodes.documentation:
@dev Emitted when the ownership of a bounty ('_identification')
 linked to ('_source') is given to a claimant ('_claimant').
nodes.name: ClaimReward

nodes.documentation:
@dev Emitted when a claimant ('_approver') grants permission to
an approved party ('_approved') to view the claimant's claims.
nodes.name: Approve

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the values for `admin`, `rewardNonce`, an 'Id' for the 
erc20 and erc721 checks, as well as a balance threshold for
erc20 checks.
These values are immutable: they can only be set once during
construction.

@dev Utility function that compares strings ('a') and ('b')
and returns whether they have equality or not.

nodes.documentation: @dev Updates the stats of posted and claimed bounties.

nodes.name: isRewardClaimant
isRewardPoster

params._identification: The bounty nonce when it was posted.

returns.success: If the transaction was successful or reverted.

params._erc20: A bool to check if _source has an erc20 standard interface.
params._erc721: A bool to check _source has an erc721 standard interface.
params._reward: The bounty reward - just a string. Could be a hash, or a private key to a wallet.
params._source: The contract address which the bounty is linked to.

returns.id: The unique identifier of the posted bounty.

postReward(address,string,bool,bool).notice: `msg.sender` Posts a bounty reward 'reward' which is linked to a contract address.
